title: Wedding Invitation Design
content: Looking for three fonts to use for wedding invitations…one for a monogram, second for caligraphy and third for body text. The wedding is “elegantly formal, but modern”. Wedding takes place in a renovated opera/film house, overall design will employ swashes with a sort of parisian feel to it. Here’s a link to the site itself, because it’s really what the invitation will evolve from [http://www.shomler.com/calsj/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20060506114113/http:/www.shomler.com/calsj/index.htm)
author: northern_state

comments.content:
Reminds me of old hollywood too. Gorgeous building!

[Londonderry](http://web.archive.org/web/20060506114113/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/londonderry-air-nf/) could be a fun starting point.
